availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Watkins Hodges Crutcher in 1860. Father of Albert Crutcher and Anna Crutcher. Merchant in Frankfort in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort district 1, p. 114. ; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Bell Point Village, p. 1; "Necrology: John N. Crutcher, Died March 23rd 1908, Aged 77 Years," Register of the Kentucky Historical Society 6, no. 2 (1908), p. 104-05.
